name: Ink Jumble: A Thyme and a Plaice
name_original: Ink Jumble: A Thyme and a Plaice
description:
Quickfire anagrams against the clock in five good-time categories:

  • Herbs, Spices, Condiments
  • Fish and Co
  • Countries & Dependencies
  • Yearly Events & Holidays
  • Crimes

You have one minute to unjumble as many items in the category as you can. Completing one gets you a second back for each letter, but if time runs out on it, you'll waste time seeing the actual answer!

Controls

  • A-Z: Place that tile from bottom row into top row
  • Backspace: Delete tile from top row into bottom row
  • Click & hold on tile: Move tile manually
  • D-pad Right or Click & hold on Fast Forward button: Speed up jumble timeout
  • Esc (Windows version): Go back/quit game
